text: Sixlets are small round candy-coated, chocolate-flavored candy. They are made by Oak Leaf Confections, a Chocolat Frey company based in Toronto, Ontario, Canada. They are often sold in thin cellophane packages that hold them in a tube-like formation. The United States Food and Drug Administration recognized that Sixlets are safe for human consumption during a 1961 study. The ball- shaped candies come in colors that include red, brown, yellow, green, blue and orange. Category:Candy
title: Sixlets
